divs: Sighting DetailsI was with a friend when I was 10 or 11 YEARS OLD WE WERE RIDING HIS HONDA CUB 50 AROUND HIS YARD WHEN WE RAN OUT OF GAS WE WERE GETING GAS WHEN I LOOKED UP AN SEEN THIS FLYING DISC SHAPED OBJECT VERY CLEARLY THE SKY WERE CLOUDY AND YOU COULD MAKE OBJECT OUT CLEARLY,I SHOWED IT TO DENNIS WHOM I WAS RIDEING THE HONDA WITH HE DISSMISSED IT AS A SATILLITE THI WAS NO SATALLITE IT WAS CLIMBING UP NOT TOO FAST NOT TOO SLOW WE OR I LOOKED AT IT FOR SEVERAL MINUTES, THEN IT WENT INTO CLOUDS AND DISAPPEARED I KNOW WHAT I SAW! BUT THATS NOT WHATS BOTHERING ME, THIS HAPPENED IN 1968 OR 69 I SEE THIS IMAGE OF IT AWAKE OR A SLEEP ALSO THERE IS NOT A DAY GOES BY THAT I DO NOT THINK ABOUT IT 2 OR THREE TIMES A DAY THIS HAS BEEN GOING ON FOR 38 YEARS !!!!! WHY CAN'T I GET THIS OUT OF MY THOUGHTS IT JUST REALLY BOTHERS ME AND SEEMS THE OLDER I GET THE MORE I THINK OF THAT DAY I KNOW THAt sounds plum crazy but it is the truth.
